metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6300 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in ytnef before 1.9.1. This is related to a patch described as "3 of 9. Buffer Overflow in version field in lib/tnef-types.h."

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6300` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libytnef0 - 1.5-6ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libytnef package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5-6ubuntu0.1').
